Episodes.Title: Ghosts
Episodes.Plot: Ben and Alisha witness the kidnapping of an innocent terrorist suspect. Unable to forget what they've seen, they are drawn into an investigation that turns their world upside down.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence & content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Pandemic
Episodes.Plot: Ben and Alisha try to persuade a whistleblower to expose a sinister pharmaceutical company that has inadvertently released a virus and now wants to make millions from the cure.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: No Child Left Behind
Episodes.Plot: A teenage suicide uncovers a regime of negligence, bullying, propaganda and corruption in local schools. Eventually a teacher exposes the real reason why it is driving children to desperation.

Episodes.Title: Fit For Purpose
Episodes.Plot: An immigration officer speaks out over corruption in the service and Ben and Alisha soon discover a web of gangsters, corrupt officers, lawyers and politicians with a shocking agenda.

Episodes.Title: Starters
Episodes.Plot: Ben and Alisha are drawn into the dark machinations of the drinks industry. A lobbyist plays dirty to thwart them until his young daughter ends up in hospital with alcohol poisoning.

Episodes.Title: Environment
Episodes.Plot: Pollution, corruption and allegations of insider trading mean Ben and Alisha have to balance public health with personal interests. Their decision brings success, but at a high price.
